column2:
"Wow... Though it looks disgusting but
I'm looking forward to the contents."

"I have a feeling that I can make a great
leap as a cook just by acquiring this
food ingredient itself!"

"Above everything else, I want to make
this leap! I'll make sure your efforts
will not go to waste."

"I will do my best so do continue to
support me from now on, ok?!"

"うわ……
ヌメっとした感じが最悪だけど
それだけ中身に期待が持てるわね。"

"この食材を得たことで私、料理人として
大きく飛躍できそうな気がする！"

"というより、飛躍しなくちゃ！
あなたの協力を無駄にできないものね。"

"私、頑張るから
これからも応援してね！"
